name: 專題研究（二）
goals: Engaging in research projects on vehicles, energies, and power electronics.
Developing professional skills to solve problems in vehicles, energies, and power electronics applications.
Developing the understanding and actions of ethics and social service in the works.
Developing awareness for the intellectual property.
syllabus:
First to 18th weeks:

1\. Reading and analyzing vehicle, energy, or power electronics papers.

2\. Project simulations and implementations of vehicles, energies, or power electronics.

3\. Writing the final project report.
prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
